ios-tutorials.text: The following applications give a step-by-step tutorial for iOS applications. Each respective application can be run by cd-ing to the base directory and invoking "ant run-Xcode".

application.name: HelloWorld
application.text: Simple HelloWorld application for iOS.

application.name: HelloWorld (Fullscreen)
application.text: Simple HelloWorld application running in fullscreen mode.

application.name: HelloWorld (Auto-Rotate)
application.text: HelloWorld application that rotates depending on device orientation.

application.name: HelloWorld (Landscape)
application.text: HelloWorld application that runs in landscape mode.

application.name: AutoResize
application.text: Use iOS' builtin mechanism for auto-resizing widgets when device orientation changes.

application.name: Relayout
application.text: Programmatically change the layout when device orientation changes.

application.name: Drawing
application.text: Simple drawing example.

application.name: MultiTouch
application.text: A simple multi-touch example. Fingers placed on the screen are tracked while being moved.

application.name: SayHello
application.text: Lets the user enter a name and upon pressing a button, the name will be set as a greeting in a label.

application.name: Dialog
application.text: Use a modal dialog to let the user edit a name.

application.name: TabBar
application.text: Example for a UITabBarController that allows the user to select between different tabs.

application.name: Stack
application.text: Example for a UINavigationController that implements a stack of views.

application.name: List
application.text: Example for a UITableViewController that implements a list of items.

application.name: Accelerometer
application.text: Display the current (x, y, z) accelerometer values as text labels.

android-tutorials.text: The following applications give a step-by-step tutorial for Android applications. Each respective application can be run by cd-ing to the base directory and invoking "ant run-Android".

application.name: HelloWorld (prog)
application.text: Simple HelloWorld application for Android. Implementation without any layout resources.
application.xmlvm-status: Partially working. Rotation does not work.

application.name: HelloWorld (decl)
application.text: Simple HelloWorld application for Android. Implementation using a simple layout resource to declare the content view.
application.xmlvm-status: Partially working. Rotation does not work.

application.name: HelloWorld (fullscreen)
application.text: Simple HelloWorld application for Android. Implementation using a simple layout resource to declare the content view being showed in fullscreen mode without title bar.
application.xmlvm-status: Partially working. Title bar not hidden.

application.name: HelloWorld (portrait)
application.text: Simple HelloWorld application for Android. Implementation using a simple layout resource to declare the content view being showed. The orientation is locked to portrait mode.

application.name: HelloWorld (landscape)
application.text: Simple HelloWorld application for Android. Implementation using a simple layout resource to declare the content view being showed. The orientation is locked to landscape mode.

application.name: HelloWorld (i18n)
application.text: Simple HelloWorld application for Android. Implementation using a simple layout resource to declare the content view being showed. Application name and the greeting text are defined by String resources to support internationalization
application.xmlvm-status: Partially working. Rotation does not work.

application.name: Layout (linear)
application.text: A simple Android application demonstrating layout capabilities using a LinearLayout.
application.xmlvm-status: Partially working. Rotation does not work.

application.name: Layout (relative)
application.text: A simple Android application demonstrating layout capabilities using a RelativeLayout.
application.xmlvm-status: Partially working. Rotation does not work.

application.name: SayHello (prog)
application.text: A simple Android application demonstrating simple event handling with a button as well as accessing UI widgets. The application is implemented without declaring layout resources.

application.name: SayHello (decl)
application.text: A simple Android application demonstrating simple event handling with a button as well as accessing UI widgets. The application is implemented declaring a layout resources which also declares the Button's event handler.
application.xmlvm-status: Partially working. Rotation does not work. Objc backend not working due to missing reflection functionality.

application.name: Drawing
application.text: A simple Android application demonstrating drawing capabilities using the Canvas and Paint classes.
application.xmlvm-status: Partially working. Rotation does not work.

application.name: ActivitySwitch
application.text: A simple Android application demonstrating switching between activities with the called activity providing a result to the calling activity. Additionally the application facilitates a BackKey handler.
application.xmlvm-status: Partially working. C Backend only and rotation does not work.

application.name: Menu
application.text: A simple Android application demonstrating creating and handling option menus.

application.name: TabBar
application.text: A simple Android application demonstrating creating and handling TabBars to navigate through the application.

application.name: List
application.text: A simple Android application demonstrating using ListActivities and ArrayAdapters.

application.name: Accelerometer
application.text: A simple Android application demonstrating how to get the accelerometer sensor readings.
